arts.ttl: Chris Wilder hits back at Paul Warne in Derby County and Jerry Yates row
arts.sum: “We would have loved to have got a second goal to make it a little bit comfortable but we didn’t and 1-0 is enough to win a game of football and we move on.” Sheffield United boss Chris Wilder insisted he did not touch Derby County forward Jerry Yates in an incident which got both managers booked.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne explains why he 'lost it' with Chris Wilder in Derby County v Sheffield United fracas
arts.sum: "My booking today was because I thought Chris touched my player and I am not having it. And speaking in his press conference after the 1-0 defeat, inflicted by Gus Hamer's free-kick, Warne said he was unwilling to let anybody touch his players.

arts.ttl: Leigh Curtis's Derby County players ratings v Sheffield United as duo lack punch amid crucial wall error - Leigh Curtis
arts.sum: In what was Paul Warne's 400th game in management, Derby created a decent opportunity within 10 seconds when Kenzo Goudmijn slipped a pass into the run of Kayden Jackson but his shot towards the far post forced Harry Souttar into a desperate clearance. Nathaniel Mendez-Laing had a penalty appeal turned down before the winger smashed the upright with a shot in what was Derby's best chance of the half.

arts.ttl: Gustavo Hamer earns Sheffield United victory against Derby
arts.sum: It was the midfielder’s fourth goal of the season.

arts.ttl: Paul Warne chooses David Ozoh replacement in Derby County team to face Sheffield United
arts.sum: Derby: Zetterstrom, Nyambe, Nelson, Cashin, Elder; Osborn, Adams, Goudmijn; Mendez-Laing, Yates, Jackson Paul Warne made just one change to his starting XI for Derby County's clash against Sheffield United this afternoon as the Rams went in search of victory at Bramall Lane.

arts.ttl: Sheffield United vs Derby County – Preview
arts.sum: Sheffield United return to Bramall Lane this Saturday afternoon to face a Derby Count team that’s looking to make it three victories in a row. In fact, both sides head into this fixture with two wins and clean sheets back-to-back. arts.ttl: Paul Warne given Derby County injury boost ahead of Sheffield United clash
arts.sum: Wilson picked up a hamstring injury in the win over Middlesbrough last month but has trained this week and is now pushing for a place in the squad. Kane Wilson is fit and available for Derby County's trip to Sheffield United this weekend but Liam Thompson, David Ozoh and Tom Barkhuizen are all sidelined.
